title: Need to talk to Riot Gehirn
body:
Howdy folks,

I need to talk to Riot Gehirn directly about an incident that occurred.
I can't make a support ticket about this issue due to certain incidents which occurred last year (Gehirn can confirm).
Gehirn helped me with these issues last year and only he will be able to address it properly.

Anyway, if Riot Gehirn could add me via a private channel for a very quick brief discussion (LoL Account Related).

Again I can't make a support ticket to avoid issues that happened last year.
If talking in private is not possible I can talk here if Riot Gehirn responds or I can make a support ticket if he promises to address it himself.

If you happen to know Gehirn or have him added in league, I'd appreciate pinging him about this once.

Thanks!

replies.body: If you create a ticket and directly request Gehirn, it should get routed to him. Otherwise, I could pass along the ticket number once that's created. Tickets are the primary way of handling requests that require privacy.

Hey Wuks,

Thanks for the swift response!

I'm not too concerned about privacy, its more or less that Gehirn handles the request.
I think I'll wait on this post for a while and if I have no request I will make a ticket requesting him directly.

Thanks again!

Hi Byte, I think I know why you want to contact me, I won't raise it here unless you do.
But know that I'm not anyone's personal support contact, and I do believe that a regular PS ticket is the appropriate route to get a response to your concerns. If you're not satisfied with their response, reply to me here and I may review it, but regular PS should be your first point of contact for any issues.

Hey, I've been trying to make a support ticket for about 1 hour now.
Every time I press submit I'm redirected but no new ticket is made?
I tried on Chrome and Edge.

Is there an issue with Ticket creation right now?

EDIT: On second thought, don't worry. I will try to resolve the issue on my own. Thanks for the help everybody.

Hmm, you might be right. There were no tickets coming in during the hour that you attempted to make one. Not sure why but there might have been an issue.
If you attempt to make one now it should work as I am seeing tickets come in as I write this.
Ah okay I can confirm its working now. Thanks.
pleas  i need ur help again ,  please believe me  ,  i'm 18years old , im internatinal student'  i paid 3150aus$ in my accc ,  can u read my boards ,  please ,  only you can help me

Hey Gehirn,

Thanks for the reply.

I know you aren't anyones personal contact, sorry if this post came out that way.
I just wanted to make sure a repeat of what happened last time doesn't happen again.

I'll make a support ticket.

Thanks!

Wait, Riot please don't tell me this is ok. 

To just head over to boards and ask for a specific rioter to take care of their issues directly o.O???
